Class ChoiceSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • ChoiceSystem
  • public class ChoiceSystem
extends Object
    The overall "script" of the game. Contains a GameWindow object and guides the player through the story of the game.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static String answer
      The player's current answer to the last button prompt
      private static Entity player
      The player Entity whose health is displayed to the window
      private static GameWindow window
      The window that the entire game is displayed on
